title: Transforming the European Refugee Crisis into Opportunity - Looking at the Evidence
text: Up until recently, many Europeans knew images of large refugee camps and desperate families trying to cross borders only from TV screens. The unprecedented influx of refugees into Europe , the largest since World War II , have made these
